text: Mago'mo'ma avanama kenesia zankuma huno, tamagra anteramita ankeromofo mono hunteho hanigetma, tamagra atrenenkeno tamagrira tamazeri fenka otreno. E'inahu vahe'mo'za korapa zamarimpamofo avu'ava nevaririza, zamagrama antahi'zana zamagra'ake knare antahi'zana eri'none hu'za zmavufga ra nehaze.
